Text:
"The Ultimate Speed Pack will introduce the Pagani Zonda R, McLaren F1LM, Lamborghini Aventador J and Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Vitesse along with 25 new events and 70 speed-themed milestones spread throughout Most Wanted’s city. Once you’ve mastered the new vehicles, you’ll be able to battle a new Most Wanted rival, the Hennessey Venom GT Spyder, which would make an absolute killing in online multiplayer."

Enjoy! And Merry Christmas! :)
